description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take off into the wild blue yonder as the pilot of your very own Bi-Plane. Math problems will determine where you fly in the sky as you try to plow into the cloud that has the correct answer on it.  Math Aerobat continues the fun that Math Sniper 3D started with a simple, but fun math problem solving game.
